channel.title: personal care on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in personal care on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Dove
Dove Logo Dove is an American personal care brand owned by Unilever originating in the United States. Dove products are manufactured in Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Ireland, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Pakistan, Philippines, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey and the United States. Source About Dove For over a decade, Dove’ve been working to make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, and here’s where the journey continues. ]] >
item.title: Dove
item.description: Dove is an American personal care brand owned by Unilever originating in the United States. Dove products are manufactured in Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Ireland, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Pakistan, Philippines, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey and the United States. Source About Dove For over a decade, Dove’ve been working to make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, and here’s where the journey continues.

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Oral-B
Oral-B Logo Oral-B is a brand of oral hygiene products, including toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes. The brand has been in business since the invention of the Hutson toothbrush in 1950. It has been owned by American multinational Procter & Gamble (P&G) since 2006. Source ]] >
item.title: Oral-B
item.description: Oral-B is a brand of oral hygiene products, including toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes. The brand has been in business since the invention of the Hutson toothbrush in 1950. It has been owned by American multinational Procter & Gamble (P&G) since 2006. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Tampax
Tampax Logo Tampax is a brand of tampon currently owned by Procter & Gamble and sold in over 100 countries. Both the brand and the product were invented by Dr. Earle Haas, who filed a patent in 1931. The original product was designed from the start as flushable and biodegradeable. Source ]] >
item.title: Tampax
item.description: Tampax is a brand of tampon currently owned by Procter & Gamble and sold in over 100 countries. Both the brand and the product were invented by Dr. Earle Haas, who filed a patent in 1931. The original product was designed from the start as flushable and biodegradeable. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Tide
Tide Logo Tide is a laundry detergent owned and produced by American multinational Procter & Gamble. Introduced in 1946, it is the highest selling detergent brand in the world, with an estimated 14.3 percent of the global market. Source ]] >
item.title: Tide
item.description: Tide is a laundry detergent owned and produced by American multinational Procter & Gamble. Introduced in 1946, it is the highest selling detergent brand in the world, with an estimated 14.3 percent of the global market. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Uniliver
Uniliver Logo Unilever is a British-Dutch transnational consumer goods company co-headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and Rotterdam, Netherlands. Its products include food and beverages (about 40 per cent of its revenue), cleaning agents, beauty products, and personal care products. It is Europe’s seventh most valuable company. Unilever is one of the oldest multinational companies; its products are available in around 190 countries. Source Source ]] >
item.title: Uniliver
item.description: Unilever is a British-Dutch transnational consumer goods company co-headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and Rotterdam, Netherlands. Its products include food and beverages (about 40 per cent of its revenue), cleaning agents, beauty products, and personal care products. It is Europe’s seventh most valuable company. Unilever is one of the oldest multinational companies; its products are available in around 190 countries. Source Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Colgate
Colgate Logo Colgate is an umbrella brand principally used for oral hygiene products such as toothpastes, toothbrushes, mouthwashes and dental floss. Manufactured by the American consumer-goods conglomerate Colgate-Palmolive, Colgate oral hygiene products were first sold by the company in 1873, sixteen years after the death of the founder, William Colgate. The company originally sold soap. Source ]] >
item.title: Colgate
item.description: Colgate is an umbrella brand principally used for oral hygiene products such as toothpastes, toothbrushes, mouthwashes and dental floss. Manufactured by the American consumer-goods conglomerate Colgate-Palmolive, Colgate oral hygiene products were first sold by the company in 1873, sixteen years after the death of the founder, William Colgate. The company originally sold soap. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Colgate-Palmolive
Colgate-Palmolive Logo Colgate-Palmolive Company is an American worldwide consumer products company focused on the production, distribution and provision of household, health care, and personal care products. Under its “Hill’s Pet Nutrition” brand, it is also a manufacturer of veterinary products. The company’s corporate offices are on Park Avenue in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. Source ]] >
item.title: Colgate-Palmolive
item.description: Colgate-Palmolive Company is an American worldwide consumer products company focused on the production, distribution and provision of household, health care, and personal care products. Under its “Hill’s Pet Nutrition” brand, it is also a manufacturer of veterinary products. The company’s corporate offices are on Park Avenue in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Gillette
Gillette Logo Gillette is a brand of safety razors and other personal care products including shaving supplies, owned by the multi-national corporation Procter & Gamble (P&G). Source ]] >
item.title: Gillette
item.description: Gillette is a brand of safety razors and other personal care products including shaving supplies, owned by the multi-national corporation Procter & Gamble (P&G). Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Johnson & Johnson
Johnson-Johnson Logo Johnson & Johnson is an American multinational medical devices, pharmaceutical and consumer packaged goods manufacturing company founded in 1886. Its common stock is a component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average and the company is ranked No. 37 on the 2018 Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue. J&J is one of the world’s most valuable companies. Source ]] >
item.title: Johnson-Johnson
item.description: Johnson & Johnson is an American multinational medical devices, pharmaceutical and consumer packaged goods manufacturing company founded in 1886. Its common stock is a component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average and the company is ranked No. 37 on the 2018 Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue. J&J is one of the world’s most valuable companies. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
L'Oréal
LOreal Logo L’Oréal S.A. is a French personal care company headquartered in Clichy, Hauts-de-Seine with a registered office in Paris. It is the world’s largest cosmetics company and has developed activities in the field concentrating on hair colour, skin care, sun protection, make-up, perfume, and hair care. Source ]] >
item.title: LOreal
item.description: L’Oréal S.A. is a French personal care company headquartered in Clichy, Hauts-de-Seine with a registered office in Paris. It is the world’s largest cosmetics company and has developed activities in the field concentrating on hair colour, skin care, sun protection, make-up, perfume, and hair care. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Palmolive
Palmolive Logo Palmolive is the trademark of a line of products produced by the American company Colgate-Palmolive. The name originated in 1898, and the company sells associated products in various countries. Such products include soap, shampoo, hair conditioner, body wash and hand-wash liquid. In some countries, the line of products also includes a dishwashing liquid. In Japan, the products are distributed under license by Daiichi Sekken Co., Ltd. since 2018 Source ]] >
item.title: Palmolive
item.description: Palmolive is the trademark of a line of products produced by the American company Colgate-Palmolive. The name originated in 1898, and the company sells associated products in various countries. Such products include soap, shampoo, hair conditioner, body wash and hand-wash liquid. In some countries, the line of products also includes a dishwashing liquid. In Japan, the products are distributed under license by Daiichi Sekken Co., Ltd. since 2018 Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Pampers
Pampers Logo Pampers is an American brand of baby and toddler products marketed by Procter & Gamble. Source ]] >
item.title: Pampers
item.description: Pampers is an American brand of baby and toddler products marketed by Procter & Gamble. Source

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
 Shiseido (資生堂)
Shiseido Logo
Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012. It is the largest cosmetic firm in Japan and the fifth largest cosmetics company in the world.[Shiseido is only available at cosmetic counters at selected department stores or pharmacists.
]] >
item.title: Shiseido
item.description: Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012. It is the largest cosmetic firm in Japan and the fifth largest cosmetics company in the world.[Shiseido is only available at cosmetic counters at selected department stores or pharmacists.

item.turbo:content:
<![CDATA[
Puzzle Makeup
Puzzle Makeup Logo About Puzzle Makeup Puzzle cosmetics are great quality, composed of mineral ingredients and are talc and paraben free, with no harsh chemicals. All Puzzle cosmetics are cruelty free with no animal testing. At Puzzle Makeup, Puzzle Makeup natural, talc and paraben free cosmetics bring a healthy perspective to personal beauty at an honest price. ]] >
item.title: Puzzle Makeup
item.description: About Puzzle Makeup Puzzle cosmetics are great quality, composed of mineral ingredients and are talc and paraben free, with no harsh chemicals. All Puzzle cosmetics are cruelty free with no animal testing. At Puzzle Makeup, Puzzle Makeup natural, talc and paraben free cosmetics bring a healthy perspective to personal beauty at an honest price.
